examples.example: 他以平常的心态面对生活中的种种挑战，总是能保持乐观向上。

translate.english: He faces all kinds of challenges in life with an ordinary state of mind and can always remain optimistic.

examples.example: 他以一颗平常的心看待得失，生活得十分快乐。

translate.english: He views gains and losses with an ordinary heart and lives very happily.

examples.example: 他有着一颗平常的心，无论遇到什么事都能从容应对。

translate.english: He has an ordinary heart and can deal with whatever happens calmly.
